zyu19.libs.action.chain

Class ActionChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • zyu19.libs.action.chain.AbstractActionChain<ActionChain>
      • zyu19.libs.action.chain.ActionChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChainStyle<ActionChain>

    public class ActionChain
extends AbstractActionChain<ActionChain>
    For usages of this class, please refer to javadoc of ChainStyle and ErrorHolder.

    This class provides the major functions of this library. It helps programmers organize network "actions" in Android and other similar platforms with restrictions about network operations on UI thread.

    This class implements ChainStyle, so that programmers can choose the correct thread for every "action" they add to the ActionChain, and so that they can avoid callback hell.

    When an "action" throws any Exception, this class will provide a ErrorHolder through the onFailure callback, so that programmers can recover a set of "actions" from an Exception efficiently.

    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Zhongzhi Yu
    See Also:
    AbstractActionChain, ChainStyle, ErrorHolder
